thread.title: Macau Developer’s Bail Set at $50 Million - WSJ
thread.title_full: Macau Developer’s Bail Set at $50 Million - WSJ

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Macau Developer’s Bail Set at $50 Million - WSJ
text:
A federal magistrate judge in Manhattan set bail at $50 million on Friday for a Macau real-estate mogul charged in an alleged bribery scheme involving United Nations officials, but prosecutors who sought to keep him detained are considering an appeal because they consider him a flight risk.
Even if he meets the conditions of release and makes bail, $20 million of which must be in cash, 67-year-old Ng Lap Seng wouldn’t be released to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
